articles.author: Matthew Cappucci
articles.title: Severe weather outbreak underway for parts of Central, Southern U.S. as major storm barrels east
articles.description: Damaging winds and potentially strong tornadoes are likely. This storm will also bring wintry hazards, including freezing rain.
articles.content: A powerful storm system is unleashing a severe thunderstorm outbreak across the southern Plains and portions of the Mississippi Valley, expected to last from Friday into Saturday, with widespread damaging winds and the potential for tornadoes, a few of which … [+5934 chars]

articles.author: Christopher Federico
articles.title: Scientist, Guided Missiles’: The Week In One Song
articles.description: Iran responds this week with missiles.
